description: Ejada Systems has been a leading provider of IT services and solutions provider in the MENA region for nearly 20 years, specializing in enterprise digital transformation. During my internship, I gained experience in backend development and database management by learning and using the Spring Boot framework in Java
list: Developed and optimized a microservices-based e-commerce application, using Spring and Spring Boot.
Worked with databases using JPA and Hibernate, handled data validation and error management.
Built 40+ RESTful APIs for multiple microservices, improving scalability and performance.

description: bld.ai is a tech company focused on accelerating global innovation by turning ideas into scalable solutions. I was selected to join the internship after competing with more than 650+ competitive programmers from all over the Arab and African region, and I managed to secure a slot among other top talents. During my internship, I learned and gained experience in full stack development, designing and implementing both front-end user interfaces and back-end systems.
list: Built dynamic front-end applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, for better user experience.
Developed backend systems using Django, focusing on data handling and application performance.
